attributes.name: Patient Age
attributes.description: Age of the patient

attributes.name: Diagnosis Date
attributes.description: Date of initial diagnosis

attributes.name: Birthdate
attributes.description: The birthdate of the patient.

attributes.name: Tumor extension
attributes.description: The extension of the tumor

attributes.name: First Name
attributes.description: The first name of the patient.

attributes.name: Radiation Dose
attributes.description: Total radiation dose delivered to the patient in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Radiation Type
attributes.description: Type of radiation therapy used

attributes.name: Fractionation Schedule
attributes.description: Schedule of radiation dose fractions

attributes.name: Treatment Machine
attributes.description: Radiation treatment machine used

attributes.name: Target Volume
attributes.description: Volume of tissue targeted by radiation

attributes.name: Boost Radiation Dose
attributes.description: Additional radiation dose given as a boost

attributes.name: Simulation Date
attributes.description: Date of radiation simulation

attributes.name: Radiation Start Date
attributes.description: Start date of the radiation therapy

attributes.name: Radiation End Date
attributes.description: End date of the radiation therapy

attributes.name: Concurrent Chemotherapy
attributes.description: Whether chemotherapy was administered concurrently with radiation

attributes.name: Radiation Technique
attributes.description: Technique used for radiation therapy

attributes.name: Beam Energy
attributes.description: Energy of the radiation beam used in MeV

attributes.name: Number of Fractions
attributes.description: Total number of radiation fractions delivered

attributes.name: Total Treatment Time
attributes.description: Total time from the start to the end of radiation therapy, measured in days

attributes.name: Daily Dose
attributes.description: Daily dose of radiation delivered, measured in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Beam Type
attributes.description: Type of radiation beam used in treatment

attributes.name: Beam Modality
attributes.description: Modality of the radiation beam

attributes.name: Gantry Angle
attributes.description: Angle of the radiation therapy machine's gantry during treatment

attributes.name: Table Height
attributes.description: Height of the treatment table during radiation therapy

attributes.name: Isocenter Position
attributes.description: Position of the isocenter relative to the treatment machine coordinates

attributes.name: Prescription Dose
attributes.description: Dose of radiation prescribed for the entire treatment course, measured in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Cumulative Dose
attributes.description: Cumulative dose of radiation received by the patient over multiple sessions, measured in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Treatment Interruptions
attributes.description: Record of any interruptions during the radiation treatment course

attributes.name: Reason for Interruption
attributes.description: Reasons for any interruptions during the treatment

attributes.name: Outcome Assessment
attributes.description: Assessment of the patient's outcome following the completion of radiation therapy

attributes.name: Patient Feedback
attributes.description: Qualitative feedback from the patient regarding treatment experience

attributes.name: Dosimetry Verification
attributes.description: Verification of dosimetry calculations before the treatment commencement

attributes.name: Immobilization Device
attributes.description: Type of immobilization device used during radiation therapy

attributes.name: Patient Alignment
attributes.description: Methods used for patient alignment during treatment

attributes.name: Radiation Safety Measures
attributes.description: Safety measures implemented during radiation treatment to protect patient and staff

attributes.name: Radioprotective Devices Used
attributes.description: List of radioprotective devices used during treatment

attributes.name: Quality Assurance Procedures
attributes.description: Quality assurance procedures followed for radiation therapy

attributes.name: Treatment Planning Software
attributes.description: Software used for radiation treatment planning

attributes.name: Monitor Unit Calculations
attributes.description: Details of monitor unit calculations for the delivered radiation dose

attributes.name: Image Guidance Technique
attributes.description: Technique used for image guidance during radiation therapy

attributes.name: Therapy Session Duration
attributes.description: Duration of each therapy session, measured in minutes

attributes.name: Radiation Field Setup
attributes.description: Configuration and setup of radiation fields used in treatment

attributes.name: Critical Organ Dose Limit
attributes.description: Maximum dose limits set for critical organs at risk

attributes.name: Anesthesia Usage
attributes.description: Information regarding the use of anesthesia during radiation therapy

attributes.name: Sequential vs Concurrent Therapy
attributes.description: Whether therapies were administered sequentially or concurrently

attributes.name: Patient Comfort Measures
attributes.description: Measures taken to ensure patient comfort during radiation therapy

attributes.name: Follow-Up Imaging
attributes.description: Types and frequency of imaging used in follow-up assessments

attributes.name: Secondary Prevention Measures
attributes.description: Preventive measures taken to mitigate secondary effects of radiation

attributes.name: Complication Management
attributes.description: Strategies employed to manage complications arising from radiation therapy

attributes.name: Treatment Review Dates
attributes.description: Dates when the treatment was reviewed and potentially adjusted

attributes.name: Lymph Node Involvement
attributes.description: Extent of lymph node involvement in the breast cancer case

attributes.name: Breast Cancer Stage
attributes.description: Stage of breast cancer at diagnosis

attributes.name: Receptor Status
attributes.description: Receptor status of the breast cancer

attributes.name: Radiation Technique for Breast
attributes.description: Radiation technique used for breast cancer treatment

attributes.name: Boost Radiation Dose for Breast
attributes.description: Additional radiation dose given as a boost in breast cancer treatment, measured in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Fractionation Scheme for Breast
attributes.description: Fractionation scheme used in breast cancer radiation therapy

attributes.name: Total Dose for Breast
attributes.description: Total radiation dose delivered in breast cancer treatment, measured in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Tumor Size at Diagnosis
attributes.description: Size of the breast tumor at diagnosis, measured in centimeters

attributes.name: Number of Radiation Fields
attributes.description: Number of radiation fields used in breast cancer treatment

attributes.name: Skin Spacing
attributes.description: Distance from the skin to the target treatment area, measured in millimeters

attributes.name: Hormone Therapy Pre-Radiation
attributes.description: Indicates whether hormone therapy was used prior to radiation treatment

attributes.name: Chemotherapy Pre-Radiation
attributes.description: Indicates whether chemotherapy was used prior to radiation treatment

attributes.name: Planned Treatment Duration
attributes.description: Planned duration of the radiation treatment course for breast cancer, measured in weeks

attributes.name: Actual Treatment Duration
attributes.description: Actual duration of the radiation treatment course for breast cancer, measured in weeks

attributes.name: Patient Age at Treatment
attributes.description: Age of the patient at the time of breast cancer treatment

attributes.name: Patient BMI
attributes.description: Body Mass Index (BMI) of the patient at the time of breast cancer treatment

attributes.name: Gleason Score
attributes.description: Gleason score at diagnosis, indicating the aggressiveness of prostate cancer

attributes.name: PSA Level at Diagnosis
attributes.description: Prostate-specific antigen (PSA) level at diagnosis, measured in ng/mL

attributes.name: Tumor Stage
attributes.description: Stage of the prostate tumor using the TNM system

attributes.name: Radiation Modality
attributes.description: Type of radiation therapy modality used for prostate cancer

attributes.name: Total Radiation Dose
attributes.description: Total dose of radiation administered during the course of treatment for prostate cancer, measured in Grays (Gy)

attributes.name: Number of Fractions
attributes.description: Number of fractions in which the radiation dose was divided

attributes.name: Androgen Deprivation Therapy (ADT) Usage
attributes.description: Indicates whether androgen deprivation therapy was used in conjunction with radiation therapy

attributes.name: ADT Duration
attributes.description: Duration of androgen deprivation therapy if used, measured in months

attributes.name: Time to Biochemical Failure
attributes.description: Time from the end of treatment to biochemical recurrence, measured in months

attributes.name: Pre-Treatment PSA Level
attributes.description: PSA level before the start of the treatment, measured in ng/mL

attributes.name: Post-Treatment PSA Nadir
attributes.description: Lowest PSA level reached after treatment, measured in ng/mL

attributes.name: PSA Doubling Time
attributes.description: Time it takes for the PSA level to double, measured in months

attributes.name: Use of Rectal Spacer
attributes.description: Indicates whether a rectal spacer was used to reduce rectal radiation exposure

attributes.name: Radiation Side Effects
attributes.description: List of side effects experienced by the patient due to radiation therapy

attributes.name: Image-Guided Therapy Usage
attributes.description: Indicates whether image-guided therapy was used during radiation treatment

attributes.name: Follow-Up Duration
attributes.description: Duration of follow-up after the completion of treatment, measured in years
